<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (++l; l != Level; ++l) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    path&#91;l&#93; = Entry(NR, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NR = NR.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intervalmapimpl/noderef/#ad56a61be137a6adfe4327233a4e492f9">subtree</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  path&#91;l&#93; = Entry(NR, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl/#adc507d70d9385ae35dcdb70dc1bebc19"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl/#ab92974e292699af764f4bd02d1f44448">IdxPair</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl/#adc507d70d9385ae35dcdb70dc1bebc19">distribute</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Nodes, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Elements, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Capacity,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CurSize, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewSize&#91;&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Position, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Grow) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Elements + Grow &lt;= Nodes &#42; Capacity &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not enough room for elements&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Position &lt;= Elements &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid position&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Nodes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl/#ab92974e292699af764f4bd02d1f44448">IdxPair</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Trivial algorithm: left-leaning even distribution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PerNode = (Elements + Grow) / Nodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Extra = (Elements + Grow) % Nodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl/#ab92974e292699af764f4bd02d1f44448">IdxPair</a> PosPair = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl/#ab92974e292699af764f4bd02d1f44448">IdxPair</a>(Nodes, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sum = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = 0; n != Nodes; ++n) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sum += NewSize&#91;n&#93; = PerNode + (n &lt; Extra);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PosPair.first == Nodes &amp;&amp; Sum &gt; Position)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PosPair = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl/#ab92974e292699af764f4bd02d1f44448">IdxPair</a>(n, Position - (Sum - NewSize&#91;n&#93;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Sum == Elements + Grow &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Bad distribution sum&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subtract the Grow element that was added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Grow) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PosPair.first &lt; Nodes &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Bad algebra&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NewSize&#91;PosPair.first&#93; &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Too few elements to need Grow&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    --NewSize&#91;PosPair.first&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Sum = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n = 0; n != Nodes; ++n) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NewSize&#91;n&#93; &lt;= Capacity &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Overallocated node&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sum += NewSize&#91;n&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Sum == Elements &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Bad distribution sum&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PosPair;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace IntervalMapImpl</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
